title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file from the outline image, and renaming another file as 'image1.jpg', the image is not refreshing or updating.
EB: The image should refresh or update after importing it again with the same name.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Observe the image and check if it refreshes or updates.
